segments.text: Good morning . What can I do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to see some coats . Would you recommend me some of them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Come to look at these styles . They sell very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which models do you sell the most ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about these ? They are the current bestsellers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like this style , but I don't like its color . Do you have this coat in yellow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will find one for you . Here you are . It's made of exceptionally good quality , pure wool , and is very soft .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , this is the latest model.If you like it , you can try it on .
segments.speaker: S1
